entry.title: Cambodian Temple Complex
entry.summary: Cambodian Temple Complex was a project I did to test my Spline Architect plugin The environment is built using modular meshes and thanks to Spline Architect, its all non-destructive, meaning I can modify the size and layout of the buildings at any time without needing…
entry.content:
Cambodian Temple Complex was a project I did to test my Spline Architect plugin

The environment is built using modular meshes and thanks to Spline Architect, its all non-destructive, meaning I can modify the size and layout of the buildings at any time without needing to create specific meshes outside of UE5.

entry.title: Spline Architect
entry.summary: Spline Architect is a plugin that I started making for myself to use for environments I create. It works in a non-destructive manner using Splines and modular meshes making it easy to change or update built environments. Creating various custom meshes or full buildings inside…
entry.content:
Spline Architect is a plugin that I started making for myself to use for environments I create. It works in a non-destructive manner using Splines and modular meshes making it easy to change or update built environments.

Creating various custom meshes or full buildings inside other applications is time consuming and hard to modify post-factum. 

Spline Architect solves this issue by generated nacesarrry dynamic elements like corners and floors from modular meshes and by using Geometry Scripting library that comes with UE5.

It bakes generated structures into regular actors in-editor avoiding any runtime logic or construction scripts making levels load as fast as if meshes were places by hand.

Its a battle tested plugin and its availabe for purchase on FAB

entry.title: Hong Kong Obscure
entry.summary: Hong Kong Obscure is a psychadelic and liminal desktop and VR game/experience I built using UE5. I utilized Nanite and Lumen extensively in this project. It features complex shaders and trippy visuals for a strange and wonderous atmosphere. The environment was built procedurally inside Houdini…
entry.content:
Hong Kong Obscure is a psychadelic and liminal desktop and VR game/experience I built using UE5. I utilized Nanite and Lumen extensively in this project. It features complex shaders and trippy visuals for a strange and wonderous atmosphere.

The environment was built procedurally inside Houdini and then ported to UE5 using Houdini for Unreal Engine plugin.

Using box meshes and simple planes I modeled the whole environment inside blender, used the blockout meshes inside Houdini with a custom built streets and buildings generators to create the whole environment.

entry.title: GAZOLINAS
entry.summary: GAZOLINAS is an semi-realistic arcade racing simulator I built using UE4. It features arcady but still true to reality vehicle physics (using Blue Man Vehicle Physics plugin). The cars can have their parameters configured for various scenarios. The game features online Steam Leaderboards with replays.
entry.content:
GAZOLINAS is an semi-realistic arcade racing simulator I built using UE4. It features arcady but still true to reality vehicle physics (using Blue Man Vehicle Physics plugin).

The cars can have their parameters configured for various scenarios. The game features online Steam Leaderboards with replays.

As with all my games I created the environments, 3d assets and code all by myself.

entry.title: Nuke Island
entry.summary: Nuke Island is a dynamic environment featuring day-night cycle and weather effects such as wind and rain. It has many controls and randomization, automatically changing weather creating a lively realistic environment.
entry.content: Nuke Island is a dynamic environment featuring day-night cycle and weather effects such as wind and rain. It has many controls and randomization, automatically changing weather creating a lively realistic environment.

entry.content:
